Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ExecuteSQLFile(SQLFilePath) means by pass all SQL Queries above and execute the sql file

Keyword.Name: SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo
Keyword.Description: Select and Edit ACH Information of A Bank Account (Images\Customer\BankAccount\6.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to edit ACH Information

Keyword.Name: SetupACH1
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 1 - This keyword will setup/modify ACH info on 2 tabs Security Record and File Header Record, Use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo ,After using this keyword, next keyword to use must be ACHSetup2 (Images\Customer\BankAccount\7.png)

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass
Param.Description: Chose Standard Entry Class, null means by pass select, let it default

Param.Name: sCheckSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box security record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check, let it default

Param.Name: sSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Input security record, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sReferenceCode
Param.Description: Input Reference code, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOrigin
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOriginName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestinationName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Destination Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckBlockingFactor
Param.Description: Check on check box Blocking Factor - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sBlockCharacter
Param.Description: Select Block Character, one character or digit, null means let it default

Keyword.Name: SetupACH2
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 2 - This keyword is the continue of keyword SetupACH1, it will setup information on last 3 tabs in ACH setup page, you need to use keyword SetupACH1 before using this keyword (Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png)

Param.Name: sCompanyEntryDescription
Param.Description: Set value for Company Entry Description, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyName
Param.Description: Set value for Company Name, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Company Discretionary Data, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sDefaultEffectiveDate
Param.Description: set value for Default Effective Date, note that this field is require field,null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCompanyDescriptiveDate
Param.Description: select Company Descriptive Date, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sOriginatingDFIIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Originating DFI Identification, note that this is required field in product, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sICD
Param.Description: select Identification Code Designator, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sCompanyIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Company Identification, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sIndividualIdentificationNumber
Param.Description: select value for Individual Identification Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Discretionary Data, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sTraceNumber
Param.Description: select value for Trace Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sOverrideDFIIdentification
Param.Description: input value for Trace Number, see image FrameworkImages\BankAccount\14.png, note that this field is required field, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sCheckAddendaRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box Addenda Record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sClickPaymentRelatedInformationSetup
Param.Description: Click on button Payment Related Information Setup - true means click, false means not click

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action after setup/modify fields - Save, Cancel, Apply

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not check this icon - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No mean not check this icon - Yes|No

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Keyword.Name: FilterInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Filter in payment page

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: View Type

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: ExportFileOnBankExports
Keyword.Description: Click an Export button on Bank Exports tab (Images\Customer\Payment\77.png)

Param.Name: sViewList
Param.Description: select a view list: Ready for Export, Exported, Error

Param.Name: sExportLevel1
Param.Description: will Click Export All button?

Param.Name: sExportLevel2
Param.Description: will do export on ACH or POS tab? not null if ExportLevel1 NOT True

Param.Name: sExportLevel3
Param.Description: what item to click export? base on tab was provided from ExportLevel2

Param.Name: sACHExportOption
Param.Description: call to ACHExportEffectiveDateOption keyword, use correct format

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Description: Copy all file to destination folder in sequence (eg.: for ACOM Uploading)

Param.Name: sSrcFolder
Param.Description: path to Source File need to upload

Param.Name: sDestFolder
Param.Description: path to Destination on sFTP server

Param.Description: Copy file in sequence with delay time

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sFile
Param.Description: file path, not null, lastfile()

Param.Name: sLine
Param.Description: line number, not null

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sReplaceBy
Param.Description: will be replaced by string

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sFile
Param.Description: file path, not null, lastfile()

Param.Name: sLine
Param.Description: line number, not null

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sReplaceBy
Param.Description: will be replaced by string

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo
Keyword.Description: Select and Edit ACH Information of A Bank Account (Images\Customer\BankAccount\6.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to edit ACH Information

Keyword.Name: SetupACH1
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 1 - This keyword will setup/modify ACH info on 2 tabs Security Record and File Header Record, Use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo ,After using this keyword, next keyword to use must be ACHSetup2 (Images\Customer\BankAccount\7.png)

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass
Param.Description: Chose Standard Entry Class, null means by pass select, let it default

Param.Name: sCheckSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box security record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check, let it default

Param.Name: sSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Input security record, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sReferenceCode
Param.Description: Input Reference code, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOrigin
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOriginName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestinationName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Destination Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckBlockingFactor
Param.Description: Check on check box Blocking Factor - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sBlockCharacter
Param.Description: Select Block Character, one character or digit, null means let it default

Keyword.Name: SetupACH2
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 2 - This keyword is the continue of keyword SetupACH1, it will setup information on last 3 tabs in ACH setup page, you need to use keyword SetupACH1 before using this keyword (Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png)

Param.Name: sCompanyEntryDescription
Param.Description: Set value for Company Entry Description, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyName
Param.Description: Set value for Company Name, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Company Discretionary Data, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sDefaultEffectiveDate
Param.Description: set value for Default Effective Date, note that this field is require field,null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCompanyDescriptiveDate
Param.Description: select Company Descriptive Date, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sOriginatingDFIIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Originating DFI Identification, note that this is required field in product, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sICD
Param.Description: select Identification Code Designator, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sCompanyIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Company Identification, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sIndividualIdentificationNumber
Param.Description: select value for Individual Identification Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Discretionary Data, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sTraceNumber
Param.Description: select value for Trace Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sOverrideDFIIdentification
Param.Description: input value for Trace Number, see image FrameworkImages\BankAccount\14.png, note that this field is required field, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sCheckAddendaRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box Addenda Record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sClickPaymentRelatedInformationSetup
Param.Description: Click on button Payment Related Information Setup - true means click, false means not click

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action after setup/modify fields - Save, Cancel, Apply

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Login to AP outsource webpagee

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: Click Sign In

Keyword.Name: GoToPayments
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payments Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional) - isClick = false mean check Payments Button Exist or not

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not check this icon - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No mean not check this icon - Yes|No

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: FilterInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Filter in payment page

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: View Type

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Keyword.Name: ExportFileOnBankExports
Keyword.Description: Click an Export button on Bank Exports tab (Images\Customer\Payment\77.png)

Param.Name: sViewList
Param.Description: select a view list: Ready for Export, Exported, Error

Param.Name: sExportLevel1
Param.Description: will Click Export All button?

Param.Name: sExportLevel2
Param.Description: will do export on ACH or POS tab? not null if ExportLevel1 NOT True

Param.Name: sExportLevel3
Param.Description: what item to click export? base on tab was provided from ExportLevel2

Param.Name: sACHExportOption
Param.Description: call to ACHExportEffectiveDateOption keyword, use correct format

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: CopyAllFileToFolder
Keyword.Description: Copy all file to destination folder in sequence (eg.: for ACOM Uploading)

Param.Name: sSrcFolder
Param.Description: path to Source File need to upload

Param.Name: sDestFolder
Param.Description: path to Destination on sFTP server

Param.Name: sDelay
Param.Description: Copy file in sequence with delay time

Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to edit ACH Information

Keyword.Name: SetupACH1
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 1 - This keyword will setup/modify ACH info on 2 tabs Security Record and File Header Record, Use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo ,After using this keyword, next keyword to use must be ACHSetup2 (Images\Customer\BankAccount\7.png)

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass
Param.Description: Chose Standard Entry Class, null means by pass select, let it default

Param.Name: sCheckSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box security record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check, let it default

Param.Name: sSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Input security record, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sReferenceCode
Param.Description: Input Reference code, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOrigin
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOriginName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestinationName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Destination Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckBlockingFactor
Param.Description: Check on check box Blocking Factor - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sBlockCharacter
Param.Description: Select Block Character, one character or digit, null means let it default

Keyword.Name: SetupACH2
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 2 - This keyword is the continue of keyword SetupACH1, it will setup information on last 3 tabs in ACH setup page, you need to use keyword SetupACH1 before using this keyword (Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png)

Param.Name: sCompanyEntryDescription

Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sFile
Param.Description: file path, not null, lastfile()

Param.Name: sLine
Param.Description: line number, not null

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sReplaceBy
Param.Description: will be replaced by string

Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Keyword.Name: ExportFileOnBankExports
Keyword.Description: Click an Export button on Bank Exports tab (Images\Customer\Payment\77.png)

Param.Name: sViewList
Param.Description: select a view list: Ready for Export, Exported, Error

Param.Name: sExportLevel1
Param.Description: will Click Export All button?

Param.Name: sExportLevel2
Param.Description: will do export on ACH or POS tab? not null if ExportLevel1 NOT True

Param.Name: sExportLevel3
Param.Description: what item to click export? base on tab was provided from ExportLevel2

Param.Name: sACHExportOption
Param.Description: call to ACHExportEffectiveDateOption keyword, use correct format

Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Keyword.Name: ExportFileOnBankExports
Keyword.Description: Click an Export button on Bank Exports tab (Images\Customer\Payment\77.png)

Param.Name: sViewList
Param.Description: select a view list: Ready for Export, Exported, Error

Param.Name: sExportLevel1
Param.Description: will Click Export All button?

Param.Name: sExportLevel2
Param.Description: will do export on ACH or POS tab? not null if ExportLevel1 NOT True

Param.Name: sExportLevel3
Param.Description: what item to click export? base on tab was provided from ExportLevel2

Param.Name: sACHExportOption
Param.Description: call to ACHExportEffectiveDateOption keyword, use correct format

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCompanyIdentification

Param.Description: input value for Trace Number, see image FrameworkImages\BankAccount\14.png, note that this field is required field, null means by pass select it

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sDownloadFile

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo
Keyword.Description: Select and Edit ACH Information of A Bank Account (Images\Customer\BankAccount\6.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to edit ACH Information

Keyword.Name: SetupACH1
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 1 - This keyword will setup/modify ACH info on 2 tabs Security Record and File Header Record, Use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo ,After using this keyword, next keyword to use must be ACHSetup2 (Images\Customer\BankAccount\7.png)

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass
Param.Description: Chose Standard Entry Class, null means by pass select, let it default

Param.Name: sCheckSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box security record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check, let it default

Param.Name: sSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Input security record, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sReferenceCode
Param.Description: Input Reference code, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOrigin
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOriginName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestinationName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Destination Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckBlockingFactor
Param.Description: Check on check box Blocking Factor - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sBlockCharacter
Param.Description: Select Block Character, one character or digit, null means let it default

Keyword.Name: SetupACH2
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 2 - This keyword is the continue of keyword SetupACH1, it will setup information on last 3 tabs in ACH setup page, you need to use keyword SetupACH1 before using this keyword (Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png)

Param.Name: sCompanyEntryDescription
Param.Description: Set value for Company Entry Description, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyName
Param.Description: Set value for Company Name, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Company Discretionary Data, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sDefaultEffectiveDate
Param.Description: set value for Default Effective Date, note that this field is require field,null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCompanyDescriptiveDate
Param.Description: select Company Descriptive Date, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sOriginatingDFIIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Originating DFI Identification, note that this is required field in product, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sICD
Param.Description: select Identification Code Designator, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sCompanyIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Company Identification, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sIndividualIdentificationNumber
Param.Description: select value for Individual Identification Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Discretionary Data, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sTraceNumber
Param.Description: select value for Trace Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sOverrideDFIIdentification
Param.Description: input value for Trace Number, see image FrameworkImages\BankAccount\14.png, note that this field is required field, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sCheckAddendaRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box Addenda Record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sClickPaymentRelatedInformationSetup
Param.Description: Click on button Payment Related Information Setup - true means click, false means not click

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action after setup/modify fields - Save, Cancel, Apply

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not check this icon - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No mean not check this icon - Yes|No

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Keyword.Name: FilterInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Filter in payment page

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: View Type

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Keyword.Name: ExportFileOnBankExports
Keyword.Description: Click an Export button on Bank Exports tab (Images\Customer\Payment\77.png)

Param.Name: sViewList
Param.Description: select a view list: Ready for Export, Exported, Error

Param.Name: sExportLevel1
Param.Description: will Click Export All button?

Param.Name: sExportLevel2
Param.Description: will do export on ACH or POS tab? not null if ExportLevel1 NOT True

Param.Name: sExportLevel3
Param.Description: what item to click export? base on tab was provided from ExportLevel2

Param.Name: sACHExportOption
Param.Description: call to ACHExportEffectiveDateOption keyword, use correct format

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sFile
Param.Description: file path, not null, lastfile()

Param.Name: sLine
Param.Description: line number, not null

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sReplaceBy
Param.Description: will be replaced by string

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch

Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sFile
Param.Description: file path, not null, lastfile()

Param.Name: sLine
Param.Description: line number, not null

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sReplaceBy
Param.Description: will be replaced by string

Keyword.Name: SetupACH1
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 1 - This keyword will setup/modify ACH info on 2 tabs Security Record and File Header Record, Use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo ,After using this keyword, next keyword to use must be ACHSetup2 (Images\Customer\BankAccount\7.png)

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass
Param.Description: Chose Standard Entry Class, null means by pass select, let it default

Param.Name: sCheckSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box security record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check, let it default

Param.Name: sSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Input security record, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sReferenceCode
Param.Description: Input Reference code, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOrigin
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOriginName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestinationName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Destination Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckBlockingFactor
Param.Description: Check on check box Blocking Factor - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sBlockCharacter
Param.Description: Select Block Character, one character or digit, null means let it default

Keyword.Name: SetupACH2
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 2 - This keyword is the continue of keyword SetupACH1, it will setup information on last 3 tabs in ACH setup page, you need to use keyword SetupACH1 before using this keyword (Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png)

Param.Name: sCompanyEntryDescription
Param.Description: Set value for Company Entry Description, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyName
Param.Description: Set value for Company Name, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Company Discretionary Data, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sDefaultEffectiveDate
Param.Description: set value for Default Effective Date, note that this field is require field,null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCompanyDescriptiveDate
Param.Description: select Company Descriptive Date, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sOriginatingDFIIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Originating DFI Identification, note that this is required field in product, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sICD
Param.Description: select Identification Code Designator, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sCompanyIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Company Identification, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sIndividualIdentificationNumber
Param.Description: select value for Individual Identification Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Discretionary Data, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sTraceNumber
Param.Description: select value for Trace Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sOverrideDFIIdentification
Param.Description: input value for Trace Number, see image FrameworkImages\BankAccount\14.png, note that this field is required field, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sCheckAddendaRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box Addenda Record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sClickPaymentRelatedInformationSetup
Param.Description: Click on button Payment Related Information Setup - true means click, false means not click

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action after setup/modify fields - Save, Cancel, Apply

Keyword.Name: SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo
Keyword.Description: Select and Edit ACH Information of A Bank Account (Images\Customer\BankAccount\6.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to edit ACH Information

Keyword.Name: SetupACH1
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 1 - This keyword will setup/modify ACH info on 2 tabs Security Record and File Header Record, Use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo ,After using this keyword, next keyword to use must be ACHSetup2 (Images\Customer\BankAccount\7.png)

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass
Param.Description: Chose Standard Entry Class, null means by pass select, let it default

Param.Name: sCheckSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box security record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check, let it default

Param.Name: sSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Input security record, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sReferenceCode
Param.Description: Input Reference code, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOrigin
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOriginName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestinationName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Destination Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckBlockingFactor
Param.Description: Check on check box Blocking Factor - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sBlockCharacter
Param.Description: Select Block Character, one character or digit, null means let it default

Keyword.Name: SetupACH2
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 2 - This keyword is the continue of keyword SetupACH1, it will setup information on last 3 tabs in ACH setup page, you need to use keyword SetupACH1 before using this keyword (Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png)

Param.Name: sCompanyEntryDescription
Param.Description: Set value for Company Entry Description, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyName
Param.Description: Set value for Company Name, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Company Discretionary Data, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sDefaultEffectiveDate
Param.Description: set value for Default Effective Date, note that this field is require field,null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCompanyDescriptiveDate
Param.Description: select Company Descriptive Date, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sOriginatingDFIIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Originating DFI Identification, note that this is required field in product, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sICD
Param.Description: select Identification Code Designator, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sCompanyIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Company Identification, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sIndividualIdentificationNumber
Param.Description: select value for Individual Identification Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Discretionary Data, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sTraceNumber
Param.Description: select value for Trace Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sOverrideDFIIdentification
Param.Description: input value for Trace Number, see image FrameworkImages\BankAccount\14.png, note that this field is required field, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sCheckAddendaRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box Addenda Record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sClickPaymentRelatedInformationSetup
Param.Description: Click on button Payment Related Information Setup - true means click, false means not click

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action after setup/modify fields - Save, Cancel, Apply

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch

Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not check this icon - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No mean not check this icon - Yes|No

Keyword.Name: FilterInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Filter in payment page

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: View Type

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Keyword.Name: ExportFileOnBankExports
Keyword.Description: Click an Export button on Bank Exports tab (Images\Customer\Payment\77.png)

Param.Name: sViewList
Param.Description: select a view list: Ready for Export, Exported, Error

Param.Name: sExportLevel1
Param.Description: will Click Export All button?

Param.Name: sExportLevel2
Param.Description: will do export on ACH or POS tab? not null if ExportLevel1 NOT True

Param.Name: sExportLevel3
Param.Description: what item to click export? base on tab was provided from ExportLevel2

Param.Name: sACHExportOption
Param.Description: call to ACHExportEffectiveDateOption keyword, use correct format

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: CopyAllFileToFolder
Keyword.Description: Copy all file to destination folder in sequence (eg.: for ACOM Uploading)

Param.Name: sSrcFolder
Param.Description: path to Source File need to upload

Param.Name: sDestFolder
Param.Description: path to Destination on sFTP server

Param.Name: sDelay
Param.Description: Copy file in sequence with delay time

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sFile
Param.Description: file path, not null, lastfile()

Param.Name: sLine
Param.Description: line number, not null

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sReplaceBy
Param.Description: will be replaced by string

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Description: Select and Edit ACH Information of A Bank Account (Images\Customer\BankAccount\6.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to edit ACH Information

Keyword.Name: SetupACH1
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 1 - This keyword will setup/modify ACH info on 2 tabs Security Record and File Header Record, Use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo ,After using this keyword, next keyword to use must be ACHSetup2 (Images\Customer\BankAccount\7.png)

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass
Param.Description: Chose Standard Entry Class, null means by pass select, let it default

Param.Name: sCheckSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box security record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check, let it default

Param.Name: sSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Input security record, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sReferenceCode
Param.Description: Input Reference code, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOrigin
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOriginName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestinationName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Destination Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckBlockingFactor
Param.Description: Check on check box Blocking Factor - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sBlockCharacter
Param.Description: Select Block Character, one character or digit, null means let it default

Keyword.Name: SetupACH2
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 2 - This keyword is the continue of keyword SetupACH1, it will setup information on last 3 tabs in ACH setup page, you need to use keyword SetupACH1 before using this keyword (Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png)

Param.Name: sCompanyEntryDescription
Param.Description: Set value for Company Entry Description, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyName
Param.Description: Set value for Company Name, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Company Discretionary Data, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sDefaultEffectiveDate
Param.Description: set value for Default Effective Date, note that this field is require field,null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCompanyDescriptiveDate
Param.Description: select Company Descriptive Date, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sOriginatingDFIIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Originating DFI Identification, note that this is required field in product, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sICD
Param.Description: select Identification Code Designator, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sCompanyIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Company Identification, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sIndividualIdentificationNumber
Param.Description: select value for Individual Identification Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Discretionary Data, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sTraceNumber
Param.Description: select value for Trace Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sOverrideDFIIdentification
Param.Description: input value for Trace Number, see image FrameworkImages\BankAccount\14.png, note that this field is required field, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sCheckAddendaRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box Addenda Record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sClickPaymentRelatedInformationSetup
Param.Description: Click on button Payment Related Information Setup - true means click, false means not click

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action after setup/modify fields - Save, Cancel, Apply

Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Home Page

Param.Name: sOptional

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not check this icon - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error https://i.imgur.com/Xy5xoja.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No mean not check this icon - Yes|No

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Keyword.Description: Filter in payment page

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: View Type

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: SetupACH1
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 1 - This keyword will setup/modify ACH info on 2 tabs Security Record and File Header Record, Use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountAndEditACHInfo ,After using this keyword, next keyword to use must be ACHSetup2 (Images\Customer\BankAccount\7.png)

Param.Name: sStandardEntryClass
Param.Description: Chose Standard Entry Class, null means by pass select, let it default

Param.Name: sCheckSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box security record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check, let it default

Param.Name: sSecurityRecord
Param.Description: Input security record, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sReferenceCode
Param.Description: Input Reference code, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOrigin
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateOriginName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestination
Param.Description: Input Immediate Origin Destination, note that this is required field in product, 9 numbers, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sImmediateDestinationName
Param.Description: Input Immediate Destination Name, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCheckBlockingFactor
Param.Description: Check on check box Blocking Factor - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sBlockCharacter
Param.Description: Select Block Character, one character or digit, null means let it default

Keyword.Name: SetupACH2
Keyword.Description: Setup ACH 2 - This keyword is the continue of keyword SetupACH1, it will setup information on last 3 tabs in ACH setup page, you need to use keyword SetupACH1 before using this keyword (Images\Customer\BankAccount\13.png)

Param.Name: sCompanyEntryDescription
Param.Description: Set value for Company Entry Description, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyName
Param.Description: Set value for Company Name, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCompanyDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Company Discretionary Data, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sDefaultEffectiveDate
Param.Description: set value for Default Effective Date, note that this field is require field,null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCompanyDescriptiveDate
Param.Description: select Company Descriptive Date, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sOriginatingDFIIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Originating DFI Identification, note that this is required field in product, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sICD
Param.Description: select Identification Code Designator, null means by pass select

Param.Name: sCompanyIdentification
Param.Description: set value for Company Identification, note that this field is required field, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sIndividualIdentificationNumber
Param.Description: select value for Individual Identification Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sDiscretionaryData
Param.Description: set value for Discretionary Data, null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sTraceNumber
Param.Description: select value for Trace Number, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sOverrideDFIIdentification
Param.Description: input value for Trace Number, see image FrameworkImages\BankAccount\14.png, note that this field is required field, null means by pass select it

Param.Name: sCheckAddendaRecord
Param.Description: Check on check box Addenda Record - true means set on, false means set off - null means by pass check it, let it default

Param.Name: sClickPaymentRelatedInformationSetup
Param.Description: Click on button Payment Related Information Setup - true means click, false means not click

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action after setup/modify fields - Save, Cancel, Apply

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save
